title: recipes_Cheesy_Corn
text:
Title: Cheesy Corn.
.
Description: Creamed and whole kernel corn is baked with bacon, butter and processed cheese..
.
Ingredients:.
- 6 slices bacon.
- 2 (11 ounce) cans creamed corn.
- 2 (11 ounce) cans whole kernel corn, drained.
- 1 cup butter, cubed.
- 2 cups cubed processed cheese.
.
Instructions:.
- Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)..
- Place bacon in a large, deep skillet. Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown. Drain and crumble..
- In a 9x13 inch casserole dish combine bacon, creamed corn, whole kernel corn, butter and processed cheese; mix well..
- Bake in preheated oven for 25 minutes; stir. Bake another 20 minutes, or until heated through and set..
.
Nutrients:.
calories: 315 kcal.
carbohydrateContent: 12 g.
cholesterolContent: 68 mg.
fiberContent: 1 g.
proteinContent: 8 g.
saturatedFatContent: 15 g.
sodiumContent: 705 mg.
sugarContent: 4 g.
fatContent: 27 g.
unsaturatedFatContent: 0 g.
.
Serves: 13 servings.
